amendment.description: To rescind discretionary appropriations in the event of a debt ceiling crisis period and to honor the full faith and credit of the debts of the United States in the event of a debt ceiling crisis.

vote.text: Amendment SA 91, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 62. Record Vote Number: 137.

action.text: Amendment SA 91 proposed by Senator Braun. (consideration: CR S1884-1885) To rescind discretionary appropriations in the event of a debt ceiling crisis period and to honor the full faith and credit of the debts of the United States in the event of a debt ceiling crisis.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 91 proposed by Senator Braun.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 91, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 62. Record Vote Number: 137.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 91, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 62. Record Vote Number: 137.
